text: Heat the oil in a pan. Crush garlic and finely chop onion while the pan is warming up. Add garlic and onion to pan and cook until the onion is lightly browned.  Add undrained tomatoes to the pan. Also add the basil and oregano. Bring to boil. Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes and stir occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste and let cool.  Spread the mixture over the pizza bases.  Combine the mozzarella cheese and the grated Parmesan cheese. Sprinkle a quarter of the cheese mixture over each pizza. Top each pizza with sliced salami, finely chopped peppers, anchovies and sliced mushrooms.  Add olives on top.  Cover with the remaining cheese.  Preheat oven to 250 °C (482 °F) and bake for 20-30 minutes.  Serve hot and slice each pizza into 8 pieces
